entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
